text: That is such a weird card
It rewards you for a low life total and punishes high power creatures?
I doubt they did with “less than” cuz that would just be “exile any creature.” It’s a weird (and garbage) card but it’s consistent with white’s design of punishing an opponent for having attacked you
Bad boy, no treat
Well...imagine it if you play [[Form of the Dragon]]?
